title: FORECAST: Cool weekend giving way to balmy holiday week | Weather | fox23.com
text:
- Mostly clear and chilly overnight into Sunday morning
- Mostly sunny and mild by Sunday afternoon
- Partly cloudy with a warming trend underway early next week
- Record-setting warmth expected around Christmas
- Staying dry through the holiday with rain chances returning next weekend
